availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Company of the Kentucky State Guard in the Louisville Battalion from Louisville, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
"An Act for the Better Organization of the Kentucky Militia," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. I (Frankfort, KY: J. B. Major, State Printer, 1860), 142-171.
John Trowbridge, "John Brown's raid and the establishment of the Kentucky State Guard," accessed September 12, 2023, https://ky.ng.mil/News/Article/2702796/john-browns-raid-and-the-establishment-of-the-kentucky-state-guard/.
